lead_paragraph: A court in Shanghai ordered two Chinese firms and the founder of one of them to pay automaker BMW 3 million yuan  ($431,617.41) for registering trademarks similar to that of the German firm, the Shanghai Daily reported on Tuesday.

headline.main: China Fines Firms for Using BMW-Like Trademark: Media
headline.print_headline: China Fines Firms for Using BMW-Like Trademark: Media

snippet: A court in Shanghai ordered two Chinese firms and the founder of one of them to pay automaker BMW 3 million yuan  ($431,617.41) for registering trademarks similar to that of the German firm, the Shanghai Daily reported on Tuesday....
